Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE ABUSE
REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE ABUSE

Title: Relates to standardizing penalties associated with marihuana possession
Summary: Relates to standardizing penalties associated with marihuana possession; makes unlawful possession of small amounts of marihuana a violation punishable by a fine.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to standardize penalties associated with marihuana possession
